text: Sipas ʙa'di Nuh pajomʙarone ( cun Hud, Soleh, Iʙrohim, Lut va Suajʙ va digaronro) ʙar qavmason firistodem va onon dalelhoi ravsane ovardand ʙar haq ʙudani pajomʙariason, vale mardum ʙa on ci pes az on duruƣ ʙarovarda ʙudand, nasihathoi pajomʙaronro qaʙul nakardand va imon naovarda ʙudand. Hamcunin ʙar dilhoi tacovuzkoron muhr menihem
